name: LudumDeepThought
description:
Enter your thought on the topic (displayed in the cube).
See what other players had in mind.

Thoughts with the connection to the topic are saved in a shared pool. 

Add more and more to the pool and go deeper and deeper in the rabbithole of the collected mind of the Ludum Dare community.

Check the game more often to follow the development.

- All topics are generated by the inputs of all the players.
- Inputs will be spellchecked and denied if not accepted.
- Loops are possible and boring.
